metadata.title: CVE-2018-14447 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
trim_whitespace in lexer.l in libConfuse v3.2.1 has an out-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14447` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libconfuse-common - 2.7-5+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
libconfuse0 - 2.7-5+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: confuse package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7-5+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
